name: memory_head
description:
WARNING: potential jumpscare warning due to a bug; play w/ low audio. 

Lose your genetic memory as you splice old biologues onto your proxy, forming a network of mycelia as your go.

Xbox controller supported

WASD / stick to move

lmb / lbumper to fire

rmb / rbumper to use your body module

leg modules give you passive effects 

access altars to gain new parts at the sot of your current proxy; spend proxies to expand your mycelia network

by https://twitter.com/possmonaut & https://twitter.com/vosyline
